title: Congratulatiuons OCE, you ruined URF
body:
URF was far more fun last year, when everyone was playing for fun, and trying new champs to see if they worked.

This year, all you see is people playing Ez, Zed, Vlad, Shaco, Nid. They're playing to just win and not enjoy what they're doing. They're not going for crazy dives or anything.

And then you check their player history, and its just 10 URF Ez games, every time. 

So grats, you ruined the point of the mode to where its not fun, because unless you're also picking the same 10 deep pool of champs, you're probably just going to get crushed and not enjoy your 20mins of them farming you

Either that or, they found a champion they think is fun, so they play it a lot.

Maybe winning is fun for people.
